description: There is only one Ava Devine! This girl loves it all; bondage, anal sex, multiple orgasms and being at the complete mercy of someone else. Never have we met such a horny slut! At the beginning of the shoot she says “I’m a sex addict, no man has ever been able to keep up with me!” We tie her tight, scrub her clean, fuck all of her holes and give her a very intense spin on the Rotisserie, by the end of the shoot the real question was; can we keep up with Ava Devine?
title: Ava Devine
